title: Anna Bida
content: The implementation of Valocracy in  enables the recognition and valuation of contributions in a fair, transparent, and distributed way, without relying on traditional hierarchical structures. title: Beer tap
content: This is a complex project with multiple parts. The first part involves making beer purchasable through the web shop, which Chris has completed. After a successful payment, a webhook is sent to the backend, which verifies the payment and sends a message to the hardware that opens the valve so you can pour yourself a beer

title: Pullup record in Founders Haus
content: The goal is to keep a leaderboard of the maximum amount of pullups someone can achieve using the pullup rings. Records need to be witnessed and people can attest they saw the achievement. It needs to be simple and clear, while still being trustless

title: Poker rewards
content: Facilitate poker nights with a shared wallet to collect the bets and distribute to the winner. 70% for the winner, 30% for number 2, potentially changing the rules in the future.
